spell.name: Gnome Camera Connection
spell.description: Use on the Gnome Camera Terminal.

spell.name: Summon Razelikh
spell.description: Use at the Altar of the Defiler to summon Razelikh the Defiler.

spell.name: Opening Relic Coffer
spell.description: Opens a Black Vault Relic Coffer Door.

description: Gor'tesh's severed head, propped up on a pike.
name: Gor'tesh's Lopped Off Head

spell.name: Plant Gor'tesh Head
spell.description: Place on a SOFT DIRT MOUND.

description: Various runes and etchings cover the surface of the key.
name: Prison Cell Key

spell.name: Opening Dark Coffer
spell.description: Use on the Dark Coffer in the Black Vault.

description: A skeleton key that will open Nexus-Prince Shaffar's personal stasis chamber.
name: The Eye of Haramad

spell.name: Opening Large Gjalerbron Cage
spell.description: Unlock the large cage in the middle of Gjalerbron.

spell.name: Opening Dragonflayer Cage
spell.description: Unlocks Dragonflayer cages at Wyrmskull Village.

spell.name: Unlocking Animal Cage
spell.description: Unlocks a Cliffside Hollow animal cage.

spell.name: Unlocking Torturer Cage
spell.description: Unlocks the cages at the back of the Shatterspear War Camp.

spell.name: Open Black Cage
spell.description: Opens a Cage at Deathspeaker's Watch.

spell.name: Unlocking Twilight Cage
spell.description: Unlocks the cages at Sable Ridge.

spell.name: Unlocking Twilight Caravan Chest
spell.description: Unlocks the secure chest within the Twilight caravan.

description: It's a wonder that this flimsy twig can open anything.
name: Bamboo Key

spell.name: Opening
spell.description: Unlock Bamboo Cages to free Jinyu Prisoners and Alliance Prisoners.

description: Looks like it was scavenged from somewhere.
name: Jardu's Key

description: Looks like it was scavenged from somewhere.
name: Raki's Key

description: Looks like a shriveled old monkey's paw.
name: Soota's Key

description: A Brewmaster's tool for unlocking particularly hardy keg taps.
name: Tap Tool

description: The oddly-shaped key is carved from a hard, dark stone.
name: Stone Key

spell.name: Bamboozled
spell.description: Transform into a panda cub for 10 min.

spell.name: Unlocking Shao-Tien Cage
spell.description: Unlocks Shao-Tien cages in the Ruins of Guo-Lai.

spell.name: Unlocking Ancient Guo-Lai Cache
spell.description: Unlocks an Ancient Guo-Lai Cache in the Guo-Lai Halls.

spell.name: Unlocking Ancient Guo-Lai Cache
spell.description: Unlocks an Ancient Guo-Lai Cache in the Guo-Lai Halls.

description: An ancient key to a secret entrance in the Thunder King's Citadel. The Shado-Pan would be interested in this.
name: Key to the Palace of Lei Shen

spell.name: Gatekeeper's Orb
spell.description: Open the gate to the Bloodied Crossing.

description: Runes shimmer and dance along the teeth of this ancient key.
name: Hoard-Keeper's Key

spell.name: Unlocking Lei Shen's Burial Trove
spell.description: Unlocks one of Lei Shen's Burial Troves within the Thunder King's Citadel.

spell.name: Unlocking
spell.description: Unlocks a single cage in Garrosh's menagerie.

spell.name: Skeleton Key
spell.description: This player is holding a skeleton key. It will unlock a single cage in the menagerie.

description: Unlocks a Kor'kron cage in the Valley of Strength.
name: Kor'kron Cage Key

description: A small key with skull and crossbones affixed the top, covered in barnacles.
name: Barnacle Encrusted Key

description: A strange, lifelike mist is trapped within this small lantern.
name: Mist-Filled Spirit Lantern

spell.name: Summon Dread Ship Vazuvius
spell.description: Summon the Dread Ship Vazuvius from the depths.
